## Definition

regression:
$$
y_{i} =  \beta _{0} + \beta_{1}x_{i} + \epsilon _{i}
$$
$\beta_{0}$ is the intercept(when $x=0$, $y = \beta{0}$). \
$\beta_{1}$ is the 'slope'. \
$\epsilon_{i}$ is a random error. \
